The investigator plan enroll HIV+ woman steady state raltegravir contain highly active antiretroviral therapy ( HAART ) , age 20-40 , inclusive , report regular monthly menses . The investigator investigate drug interaction raltegravir , ethinyl estradiol ( EE ) levonorgestrel ( LNG ) . All woman receive raltegravir part regular medical care . Women enrol study approximately 8 month .
